name: Flowkit
description:
The new Flowkit for Figma has dropped! Finely-tuned user flows all up inside your favorite design tool.


Auto mode lets you connect two shapes, objects, frames, etc. with a shift click.


Once connected in Auto mode, objects remain connected while you move them around the canvas.


Manual mode gives you granular control over the size and position of each individual flow component. You can also customize the end caps with built-in nested variants.


Blocks provide a range of shapes and devices for adding flow waypoints.


Glyphs give you a quick and easy way to add more context to your user flows.


Annotate your flows with labels for quicker and clearer communication.
